results.title: Get to know the SharePoint REST service

results.title: Microsoft Fabric REST API references - Microsoft Fabric REST APIs
results.description: Microsoft Fabric REST APIs let you automate Fabric procedures and processes.

descriptions.content: Microsoft Fabric REST API documentation Learn how to use the Microsoft Fabric REST APIs to automate your Fabric processes.
